毒素效果: 酒精若被摄入，将成为致命毒药 Alcohol is now a deadly poison if ingested
各种昆虫被你的伤口吸引而来 All manner of insects are drawn to your wounds
被锚定在此位面，传送和位面旅行失败 Anchored to this Plane, Teleporting and Planar Travel fail
任何饮用你血液的生物体型将增大十倍 Any creature that drinks your blood grows 10x in size
通过严格的海鲜饮食可以避免可怕的症状 Awful symptoms can be averted with a strict Seafood diet
肘部弯曲变得缓慢而痛苦 Bending at the Elbow becomes a slow and painful process
血液因严重血友病而无法凝结 Blood no longer clots due to severe hemophilia
剧烈咳嗽带血，有时血块会自行移动 Bloody coughing fits, sometimes the clots scurry away
骨骼软化如海绵般湿软的面包 Bones soften like spongy, soggy bread
衣物和任何护甲因肿胀开始勒紧 Clothes and any Armor begins to strangle with the Swelling
舌头上长出粗糙毛发，味觉消失 Coarse Fur grows on your tongue, sense of taste vanishes
无论技巧或努力如何，你都会像石头沉入水中般迅速下沉 Despite skill or best efforts, you sink like a Stone in Water
产生对蠕虫和害虫无法控制的渴望 Develop uncontrollable cravings for worms and vermin
皮肤上的变色与致命疾病极为相似 Discoloration on skin closely resembles a deadly Disease
你施放或接受的神圣魔法效果与其本意相反 Divine Magic cast by or upon you is Reversed from intent
每晚有1/20的几率，你的影子会脱离并发动攻击 Each night, 1-in-20 chance your Shadow detaches and attacks
魔法物品引发一种奇特而强烈的恶心感 Enchanted items induce a peculiar and strong Nausea
所有食物尝起来都过于咸，连水也不例外 Everything tastes entirely too salty, even water
在矮人胡须周围引发爆炸性喷嚏 Explosive sneezes around the beard hair of Dwarfkind
暴露于空气中，你的血液会转化为令人窒息的毒气 Exposed to air, your Blood turns into a choking Gas
对强于烛光的亮度极度光敏 Extremely photosensitive to light brighter than a Candle
疲劳与倦怠，需要比之前多一倍的休息时间 Fatigue and lethargy, require twice as much rest as before
猫类在你面前弓起背，犬类则对你低吼 Felines arch their backs and Dogs growl in your presence
在火源附近会感到发热般的寒战 Feverish Chills around any form of Fire
看到水果时会不自觉地发出嘶嘶声 Find yourself involuntarily Hissing at the sight of Fruit
精细运动技能因抽搐和痉挛而受损 Fine Motor skills impaired by twitches and spasms
每隔数月，手指甲和脚趾甲会变黑并脱落。 Fingernails/Toenails blacken and fall off every few months
手指滴落无法抹去的墨色物质，沾染一切 Fingers drip an indelible inky substance, staining everything
花香引发干呕，症状持续至少一年 Floral scents induce dry retching for at least a year
无论是福是祸，你的触碰现在极具毒性 For better or worse, your touch is now incredibly toxic
触碰果实即腐坏，播种的种子永不发芽 Fruit fouls on touch, seeds you plant will never sprout
玻璃下巴：若受到正好7点伤害，则陷入昏迷 Glass jaw: If hit for exactly 7 points of damage fall unconscious
逐渐使双眼闭合持续2d6周，虹膜变色 Gradually seals eyes shut for 2d6 weeks, iris changes color
可怕的噩梦逐渐使自然睡眠变得不可能 Horrific Nightmares gradually make natural Sleep impossible
耳内出现显著的红色蜡状堆积物，导致听力困难 Impressive Red waxy build-up in Ears makes listening difficult
注射部位硬化并钙化，形成难看的硬块 Injection site hardens and calcifies, unsightly hard lumps
对鸡蛋产生强烈渴望，尤其希望整颗吞下 Intense cravings for Eggs, preferably swallowed whole
下颌和关节僵硬疼痛：破伤风 Jaw stiffens painfully, along with joints: Tetanus
抽搐动作导致施法失败或意外 Jerking movements cause Spellcasting failures/mishaps
指节肿胀，无法戴上或摘下任何戒指 Knuckles swell up, unable to remove or wear any Rings

大声喘息和急促呼吸妨碍潜行 Loud, wheezing breaths and gasping prohibit Stealth

恶意污秽使你通过魔法被侦测为邪恶 Malevolent Taint causes you to Detect as Evil via Magic
新陈代谢受损，体重迅速下降 Metabolism compromised you start rapidly losing weight
金属铠甲摩擦，导致皮肤出现渗液的蓝黑色疮口 Metal Armor chafes, creates weeping blue-black sores
坏死注射部位，圣水现在会灼伤你 Necrotic injection site, Holy Water now burns you
脚底如针刺般的疼痛，大多会阻碍奔跑 Needle-like pains on soles of Feet mostly prevent Running
鼻血逐渐转为耳出血、眼出血，甚至更严重的症状 Nosebleeds give way to ear bleeding, eye bleeding, and worse
奇异的皮疹，形似邪恶圣徽，缓慢扩散 Odd rash, resembling Evil Holy Symbols, slowly spreads
一旦握紧拳头，至少一天内无法松开 Once clenched, you cannot unclench a fist for at least a day
随机一个肢体永久肿胀至三倍大小 One random limb permanently swells 3 times in size
黏液、史莱姆和果冻似乎被你磁性地吸引 Oozes, Slimes, and Jellies seem magnetically attracted to you
他人现在能通过你独特的步态轻易认出你 Others can now identify you easily by your peculiar gait
数周内，所有牙齿和头发都会脱落 Over the course of a few weeks, all Teeth and Hair fall out
痛苦的过程，但你逐渐长出一条带刺的尾巴 Painful process, but you slowly sprout a thorny tail
奇特狼人：转变为毒害你的生物形态 Peculiar Lycanthrope: Transform into whatever poisoned you
周期性幻觉，误以为敌人数量多于实际存在 Periodically Hallucinate more Foes than are actually there
醒后前两小时内莫名失声 Perplexingly Mute during the first two hours after waking
持续出汗，皮肤滑腻，似乎无法保持干燥 Persistently slick with perspiration, just cannot seem to stay dry
颤抖不止使得瞄准投射物变得极不可靠 Quivering tremors make aiming Missiles unreliable at best
降雨如酸液般灼伤你的皮肤 Rainfall burns your skin like Acid
随机肢体完全麻痹，却感觉如同被火焰灼烧 Random limb is utterly paralyzed, but feels like it's on fire
心跳加速导致预期寿命减半 Rapid heartbeats cut your expected lifespan in half
阅读虽仍可行，但耗时延长至五倍 Reading, while still possible, now takes 5x as long

嗅觉增强，但恶臭气味令人痛苦 Sense of smell heightens, but malodorous scents are painful
看到任何条纹图案都会引发口吐白沫 Sight of anything Striped induces foaming at the Mouth
六根手指随机融合，过程痛苦不堪 Six random fingers fuse together painfully
伤口周围皮肤脱落，形成瘙痒的鳞屑 Skin sloughs off in itchy flakes around the wound
侧卧而眠，以免腐臭蜂蜜堵塞喉咙 Sleep on your side, lest gobs of rancid Honey choke as you sleep
全身出现新月形的小瘀伤 Small, crescent shaped Bruises appear all over body
接触任何类型的羽毛或羽绒时，会引发连续打喷嚏 Sneezing fits around any type of Feather or Down
刺客寻求此毒，欲取你血以制解药 Sought by Assassins who wish to bleed you for antivenom
音乐之声会立即让你昏厥 Sound of Music will cause you to Faint immediately
蜘蛛/蛇等生物会周期性地从你的肚脐中涌出 Spiders/Snakes/etc. periodically erupt from your navel
周期性吐出光滑的卵形小石子 Spit up smooth, Egg-shaped pebbles periodically
恶臭如影随形，类似穴居人般，只有你能闻到 Stench follows you, Troglodyte-esque, only you can smell it
每当掷出16时，视力突然模糊 Sudden onset of blurry vision whenever a 16 is rolled
皮肤表面在黑暗中易晒伤 Surface of your skin tends to Sunburn in Darkness
红色在你的视野中呈现为暗淡的灰色 The color Red shows up as a dull Grey in your vision
脚趾融合，双脚逐渐变为赭石色的分趾蹄 Toes meld, feet slowly become umber colored cloven hooves
完全失去平衡，耳朵渗出绿色液体 Total loss of equilibrium as Ears leak green fluid
金之触碰到裸露皮肤，效果与毒葛无异 Touch of Gold on bare skin is not unlike Poison Ivy
每当掷出11时，身体会颤抖，可能掉落手中物品 Tremors whenever an 11 is rolled, may drop held items
身体上突然长出硬如刺的毛发丛 Tufts of stiff, quill-like barbs of hair erupt over body
面部永久扭曲，呈现出狰狞的表情 Twisted and contorted Grimace graces Face permanently
无法感知极热或极冷，极易被灼伤或冻伤 Unable to feel extreme heat or cold, could easily burn/freeze
除非在24小时内截肢，否则手臂会勒死你 Unless amputated within 24 hours, arm will strangle you
无法解渴，需水量为正常的三倍 Unquenchable thirst, require 3 x more Water than normal
对任何乳制品产生强烈排斥反应 Violently repulsed by any sort of Dairy Products
喉咙收缩导致声音变化，只能进食流质食物 Voice changes as throat narrows, only pureed food possible
每周出现一次流泪性红肿和扭曲 Weeping Welts and Warps appear once a week
低语声如尖啸般刺穿你的耳膜 Whispered voices pierce your ears like loud Screams
木材及其他植物材料会引发肿块和荨麻疹 Wood and other plant material induces welts and hives
伤口感觉良好，过于良好，这种毒素极易上瘾 Wound feels good, too good, this toxin is incredibly addictive
你现在对大多数怪物来说闻起来异常美味 You now smell irresistibly delicious to most Monsters

狂热觊觎的哥布林信息素从你的毛孔中渗出 Zealously coveted Goblin pheromones ooze from your pores
